value.name: Scotland ‘moving politically backwards’ under the SNP, says Alex Salmond
value.description: Alba Party leader country had endured a ‘decade of drift’ under the party that has ‘dithered and delayed forging ahead to independence’

value.name: Humza Yousaf says Keir Starmer may 'tweak' Scottish island asylum plan
value.description: FIRST Minister Humza Yousaf has condemned plans considered by Tony Blair’s former Labour government to hold refugees on a Scottish island

value.name: Yousaf: Isle of Mull migrants plan was ‘divisive’ and ‘disparaging’ to Scotland
value.description: The First Minister has responded to records revealing plans mooted by aides to former prime minister Tony Blair in 2002.

value.name: Starmer wants to tackle civil service ‘churn’ – report
value.description: Sir Keir Starmer will seek to bring stability among senior civil servants if Labour wins the next general election, according to reports.

value.name: Keir Starmer told to 'disown' Blair government's Mull asylum plans
value.description: AN SNP MP has asked if Keir Starmer will “disown” plans drafted up by Tony Blair’s Labour government to set up an asylum holding camp in Mull.

value.name: Boris Johnson is beaten by two huge names in poll on your favourite Tory Prime Minister
value.description: Her legacy continues today with Labour leader Sir Keir Starmer recently heaping praise on her. Sir Winston was in second place with 12 per cent of votes in the poll by this website. Sir Winston, who rallied Britain to victory during World War Two ...
